thread.title: Court action, more student marches planned
thread.title_full: Court action, more student marches planned | News24

author: news24.com
title: Court action, more student marches planned
text:
Johannesburg â€“ A court bid to stop excessive police force against students, more marches against tuition fee increases, and talks to end the chaos were planned for Thursday.
- Are you affected? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
In Cape Town, parents were applying for an interdict at the Western Cape High Court to stop police from using excessive force against students. The National Association of Democratic Lawyers and Legal Resources Centre were at the court to help secure the interdict.
Lawyers for the police told reporters outside court they were still in talks and were not sure when the matter would be in court, if at all.
